author: John Carlson
title: Real Solutions for Curtailing Gun Violence
text:
The most predictable fallout from last weekâ€™s school shooting in Florida is the impassioned reactions from both sides of the gun divide, which guarantee nothing will change. Gun-control supporters demonize firearms and Second Amendment supporters, blaming the National Rifle Association for mass murder. Conservatives see their critics as caring little about the Constitution and knowing next to nothing about firearms.
But people of good faith can find common ground and help reduce gun violence in the U.S.
